channel.title: Npc Special attack

item.title: Npc Special attack
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

Example:

I use the special attack on an Npc.
I want the effect to be, that there are many low hits on the Npc.
Just like Dragon Claws, but with more hits.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Special attack
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Ferity, post:7, topic:379824”]It’s just an example with 1115.
I want the special attack work on every Npc, not only on Npc 1115.
How can I make it only effect the Npc I’m fighting against?[/quote]
i don’t understand what you want, first you say you want it to work on every NPC, then you want to make it only affect the NPC you’re fighting against?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Special attack
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

Haha yes, I know, the question is:
How can I do it?

I could change it to something like if(npc[1115].chaoticspec > 0) {

Ths would effect every Npc with the Id 1115, I don’t know how I can make, that it only effects the npc that is being attacked.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Special attack
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Ferity, post:1, topic:379824”]I am working on a special attack against Npc, I want it to hit low hits very fast.
For that I added an int at NPCHandler, but I don’t get it work correctly.

If I use Npc[i], it effects all Npcs.
The current code I’m using is:

if(npcs[i].chaoticspec > 0) { npcs[i].hitDiff = misc.random(npcs[i].HP -= misc.random(130)); npcs[i].HP -= misc.random(130); npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].hitUpdateRequired = true; chaoticspec -= 1; }

My Server is Delta based.[/quote]
You obviously need to specify which NPC you want it to affect…

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Special attack
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

I am working on a special attack against Npc, I want it to hit low hits very fast.
For that I added an int at NPCHandler, but I don’t get it work correctly.

If I use Npc[i], it effects all Npcs.
The current code I’m using is:

if(npcs[i].chaoticspec > 0) { npcs[i].hitDiff = misc.random(npcs[i].HP -= misc.random(130)); npcs[i].HP -= misc.random(130); npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].hitUpdateRequired = true; chaoticspec -= 1; }

My Server is Delta based.

Read full topic
